metadata.name: Uncommon AddinUtil.EXE CommandLine Execution
metadata.comment: Detects execution of the Add-In deployment cache updating utility (AddInutil.exe) with uncommon Addinroot or Pipelineroot paths. An adversary may execute AddinUtil.exe with uncommon Addinroot/Pipelineroot paths that point to the adversaries Addins.Store payload.

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\addinutil.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('addinutil.exe') AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-addinroot:')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-pipelineroot:'))) AND NOT (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-addinroot:"c:\\program files (x86)\\common files\\microsoft shared\\vsta')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-addinroot:c:\\program files (x86)\\common files\\microsoft shared\\vsta')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-pipelineroot:"c:\\program files (x86)\\common files\\microsoft shared\\vsta')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('-pipelineroot:c:\\program files (x86)\\common files\\microsoft shared\\vsta'))))

output.summary: Detects execution of the Add-In deployment cache updating utility (AddInutil.exe) with uncommon Addinroot or Pipelineroot paths. An adversary may execute AddinUtil.exe with uncommon Addinroot/Pipelineroot paths that point to the adversaries Addins.Store payload.
